comments: ms. fiero--> soon to be professor is one of the most inspiring english teachers ever. Shes soo passionate about her topic which is a plus. 100% fair essay grader. Discussions/lessons super organized and crystal clear. Also she relates to us sooo well and SUPER helpful--you could text her, shes available in the writing center/DAC!

Fiero is one of my favorite professors. Homework every night and she expects a lot from you, but she grades you on your effort. If she sees you are trying your hardest, you\'ll get a good grade. Do all the reading and participate in class. No test or quizzes, but projects and a lot of writing. She really loves what she does, great class to take!

I LOVE her! The readings are difficult (obviously-it\'s theory), but she explains so well the next day that I understood every concept perfectly! She moves fast, so be willing to be adaptable. Also, if you don\'t understand an assignment, make sure you go to her, because her explanations aren\'t great. A little hung up on Hurston, but overall A+++!!

HORRIBLE. you\'ll love her the first day and then you get to know her.. She\'s no help and doesn\'t make her assignment\'s clear enough. During class she\'ll never give you any real answers to any of your questions and never lets anyone finish what they have to say during discussions. There is work due EVERY single class. avoid this woman! I HATE her!

Gives loads of work, an assignment is due for pretty much every class. I did three papers and worked really hard on them, I am a good writer and an A-student btw, but I was unable to get anything above a \'C\' on any of my essays so I dropped the class before the last day to drop a class. Too much work, hard grader, wouldn\'t recommend.

She is very nice person, but I don\'t know who would think that this is an easy A, I dropped out of this class immediately because she gives crazy amounts of work, I don\'t know if she curves at the end but everyone always got a C on their essay...try taking another professor if possible
great professor, very helpful. as long as you give it your best, you will get a good grade. take

Some people are mixed on her, i can say she does give a lot of work but its really not that hard as long as she sees your giving it your all, I made it known to her day 1 that i am not perfect comprehension-wise and have some learning issues, i didnt intend on that being a strategy but she constantly talked to me and made me feel comfortable, take
LOVED HER! SHE IS VERY PASSIONATE ABOUT WHAT SHE TEACHES AND IS VERY HELPFUL TO ALL HER STUDENTS!

No textbook but there are notes and the assignments are found on the course website. She expects you to either print out the story or to bring your laptop to read from. She wants you to learn how to close read. Two papers. Midterm paper is a traditional one. The final one is what you are interested. Always available for you. Wants the best for you.

Overall easy class. She is very enthusiastic about what she teaches, i.e., trauma theory. Two papers (one midterm & one final). Class participation and attendance matters. Must do 8 out of 12 one-page responses which is fair. May or may not be "easy" depending on interest. She is very open and helpful. A good professor but there are better.

Easy class, she makes the class fun. We had 13 possible topics to choose from for the final paper, based on our major, which doesn\'t need to be a traditional eng essay. She is a must take for an easy high grade.
